attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that scottish constituency MPs who continue to occupy seats in the House of Commons are paid out of the Scotland allocation of funding from the public purse and NOT from the England allocation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These people are in the HofC only to keep Gordon Brown in office.  They were voted into office by people who are now represented by a totally different tier of politicians in the Scottish Parliament so are not legitimately in the HofC.  It is not morally right that their remuneration and other costs be borne out of the England allocation of central funds.  They should be paid by the Scottish Parliament out of their budgetary allocation.
